basics.name: Emadeldeen Eldele
basics.label: Assistant Professor
basics.summary: My research focuses on improving the robustness and efficiency of deep learning models for time series data against challenges such as domain shift, label scarcity, and sustainability.

work.name: Khalifa University, UAE
work.summary: Teaching undergraduate and graduate courses, supervising FYP, Masters, and PhD students, publishing in top-tier venues, and applying for grants.

work.name: A*STAR Singapore (I²R & CFAR)
work.summary: Worked on robustness of deep learning models for time series, sustainable AI for time series, and learning from fewer labels.

work.name: Nanyang Technological University (NTU), Singapore
work.summary: Guided lab sessions for courses including Data Analytics and Mining, Object-Oriented Design & Programming, and Digital Logic.

work.name: Institute for Infocomm Research (I²R), A*STAR Singapore
work.summary: Conducted biomedical sensors data analysis and time series analysis using deep learning.

work.name: INNOTECH Corp., Egypt
work.summary: Developed algorithms for predicting epilepsy seizures from EEG signals, optimizing electrode usage, and building robust classifiers for early warnings.

work.name: Tanta University, Egypt
work.summary: Assisted in teaching courses (ANN, programming, networks), mentored projects, and contributed to student activities.

volunteer.summary: Guest Editor of Special Issue 'Artificial Intelligence for Medical Sensing' in Sensors Journal.
Served as reviewer for leading journals (IEEE TNNLS, TNSRE, J-BHI, Neurocomputing, etc.) and program committees (ICLR 2023-25, AAAI 2023, ICDM 2022).

education.summary: Developed deep learning algorithms for biomedical time series data. Funded by SINGA scholarship (A*STAR, Singapore).
Built framework for predicting miRNA–mRNA targets using machine learning.
Studied virtualization, storage management, and cloud computing (VMware vSphere, vCloud Director).
Relevant courses: ANN, OOP, Data Structures & Algorithms, Computer Networks.

awards.title: SINGA Scholarship
awards.summary: Awarded the Singapore International Graduate Award (SINGA) for PhD studies.
